name: 1 Year Prepaid Greeting Card Subscription Special
description:
1 Year Prepaid Greeting Card Subscription Special

Compared to the monthly 12 month subscription, the prepaid special includes an additional 24 cards and set of personalized note cards.

Subscription includes:
* Each month, receive 7 hand-crafted greeting cards+envelopes
* 1 set of personalized note cards with the first month
* Cards are 5x7" on heavy linen cardstock
* Shipping is included in price and cards ship on or near the 15th of each month
* Cards are the choice of the artist, however subscriber preferences as far as greeting, occasion, ethnicity, color of dress, etc will be considered. Email reiko@mercibunches.com for more information.

name: Merci*Bunches Gift Certificates
description: Merci*Bunches Gift Certificates Merci*Bunches gift certificates make great gifts for the holidays, Christmas, birthdays, anniversaries, graduations, weddings, just because and many other occasions. Gift certificates are eligible for all Merci*Bunches items. Directions for redeeming the certificate are included with the gift certificate. Choose eGift Certificate options to have your gift certificate emailed to your recipient. Choose the Paper Gift Certificate option (additional $5) to have your gift certificate mailed with a greeting card to your recipient. Please include email or mailing address and message in the "Notes to Seller" area when checking out. Buy a $100 paper gift certificate and your gift certificate and greeting card will be mailed for free. Please allow 7 business days for delivery. Refund Policy: Merci*Bunches gift certificates are non-refundable, but can be used toward another Merci*Bunches, Studio ReikoRenee or Fun+Art+Wine purchase.

name: The Little Book of Inspirations: A to Z
description:
In The Little Book of Inspirations, artist Reiko Renee Tate offers a whimsical collection of inspirational sayings in a fresh and colorful format. For an instant source of motivation and inspiration, keep a copy of the book on your desk at work or on your coffee table.  The Little Book of Inspirations makes an ideal gift for all ages and for many different occasions.

Excerpts:
D {DWELL} Dwell on infinite possibilities.
G {GREET} Greet each day with a smile.
L {LIVE} Live it up!
U {UNDERSTAND} Understand that we are all connected.

Book type: Paperback
Pages: 58
Cover & Interior: Full color
Dimensions (inches): 7.5 wide Ã— 7.5 tall


Price:
1 book - $20
Price includes shipping & handling in U.S.

Bulk discounts available, contact reiko@mercibunches.com for more information.
